name: friendfinder
description: Application will have the user take a survey that will ask the user for his name and to input a link to a image of the user and the will ask the user a series of questions that the user will have to asnwer from a scale of 1 - 5 and then will store the users name, picture and scores from the survey in a object after the data is stored the application will try to match the user with other users that answered similarly to the user.
author: Cecilio A Ramirez Cordova
